recentIntentSummaryView.confirmationStatus: None, Confirmed, or Denied (intent confirmation, if configured)
recentIntentSummaryView.dialogActionType: ElicitIntent, ElicitSlot, ConfirmIntent, Delegate, or Close

message.content: Message to convey to the user. For example, Thanks, your pizza has been ordered.

genericAttachments.title: card-title
genericAttachments.subTitle: card-sub-title
genericAttachments.imageUrl: URL of the image to be shown
genericAttachments.attachmentLinkUrl: URL of the attachment to be associated with the card

buttons.value: Value sent to server on button click
